The Home Rule Charter for the City of Grapevine was adopted on November 16, 1965 and established a Council/Manager form of Government.  City Council consists of the Mayor and six council members.  City Council Members are elected at large and serve three-year terms.

* Appoint City Manager
* Adopt the annual budget
* Appoint members to City Boards and Commissions

City Manager
------------

* Appoint employees of the City
* Prepare the annual budget for City Council review
* Manage operations of the City
